DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether budesonide or mesalazine is more active in the treatment of lymphocytic colitis.
DOC.brief_title: Budesonide Versus Mesalazine Versus Placebo in Lymphocytic Colitis
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Symptoms and signs of indication of lymphocytic colitis Infectious diarrhoea, Diarrhoea as a result of the presence of other symptomatic organic disease(s) of the gastrointestinal tract or endoscopichistological findings Celiac disease Pregnancy or breastfeeding, Participation in an other clinical trial
